Highlights.name: Global Recruitment
Highlights.description: ‘Glocalisation’, is what we call it when it comes to hunting local talent worldwide for your global needs. KNR has an indomitable reach in geographies across the globe to assist organisations outside of India with respect to local staffing requirements in the respective regions.
